title: Games Industry News Roundup- February 24th, 2024
description: We look at some of the top news stories of the past week in the games industry.

title: Kill Team WCW Qualifier comes to the UK Goonhammer Open – June 22nd/23rd
description: Kill Team comes to the UK Goonhammer Open

title: I’m Going to Become the Joker: Malifaux at Captaincon 2024 (Part 1)
description: Hello, Mali-folks! It’s been a minute since I did one of these, but I’m back!  Captaincon 2024 was my first big wargaming con since, well, Captaincon 2023, and tournament organizer Jesse Ellis didn’t disappoint.  The Malifaux Content Creator’s Invitational returned (possibly for the last time?) and the Booty and Plunder open was as big and […]

title: TheChirurgeon’s Road Through 2024, Part 2: Shaking Off the Rust
description: TheChirurgeon's Road through 2024 picks back up with more chaos space marine hobby progress and a practice game against post-dataslate Custodes.

title: FutureProof Modular Terrain: Timeless Like RoboCop, or Eternal Shame Like RoboCop 3? – The Goonhammer Review
description: FutureProof Modular Terrain is hot on Kickstarter. Check out our hands-on review (feat. RoboCop references, for some reason).

title: An Epic Tale – The History of Small Scale Wargaming in the Grim Darkness
description: We take a look at the history of Epic and how Games Workshop got from a standalone game to sell marines on both sides to the modern release of Legions Imperialis.
